data.text:
PRTG Network Monitor

PRTG Network Monitor (formerly Paessler Router Traffic Grapher) is a server infrastructure up-time and utilization, network monitoring, and bandwidth usage solution. It enables users to collect statistical data from designated machines, software, and devices, and analyze the performance for changes in up-time and bandwidth. It services Microsoft Windows and ... show more
